title: The Power makers
creator_credit: Lee Robinson and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The film depicts a working day for a dredge operator, a train driver, a foreman and a turbine attendant at the open cut brown coal mine and power station at Yallourn, Victoria. These men join with thousands of others to convert the brown coal into electricity; the technical processes involved are shown incidentally.
